comment.author: Joshua
comment.text: What a buffoon. You went, you stood, you got run over. Lol. His only words, "I love my country...USA.." Duh stupid. Did you forget the obvious again? Nothing on any policy. So sad how stupid you are. I really hoped the cartels would take you.

replies.author: Megan
replies.text: Why is it that all you Hillary trolls only have pics of dogs and cats on your page? I can't believe that anyone would be that much of a coward to show your face.

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: Trump was told by Mr. Nieto (President of Mexico) that he was not going to pay for the wall. Now Mexico's president is pissed at Trump for saying they never talked about it before their meet and great / press conference today! Go to my Facebook page and see his post from three minutes ago!

replies.author: Connor
replies.text: Megan Trump was told by Mr. Nieto (President of Mexico) that he was not going to pay for the wall. Now Mexico's president is pissed at Trump for saying they never talked about it before their meet and great / press conference today! Go to my Facebook page and see his post from three minutes ago!

replies.author: Scott
replies.text: Oh for goodness sake, what did you expect him to do, grab the Mexican president by the throat and slap him until he said he would pay for the wall? Don't be stupid. He's not the president yet. Once he is, he will make things happen.
